Class LtpDtFeature

public class LtpDtFeature
extends AbstractLtpDtFeature
    The LTP based feature using a truncated Euclidean distance transform to estimate the distances within each slice.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
